td.content: s:61 year old female first mate presents with mild vague postprandial epigastric pain x 4 days. pt also complains of moderate vomiting, moderate nausea. o:Height 62 in, Weight 129 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 17 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed 5-FU - 1000 mg/m2 IV, cisplatin - 100 mg/m2 IV, and ordered EGD.

s:patient presents for exam. pt denies vomiting, vague postprandial epigastric pain and nausea. pt is a female first mate aged 61 ys. o:Height 62 in, Weight 131 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 73, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 18, EGD shows esophagitis with a massive gastric ulcer extending from the inscura to the pylorus, no active bleeding was noted at the site a:Stomach Cancer p:performed EGD, and performed E/M Level 1 (new patient) - Completed.

s:pt c/o 12 days h/o moderate vomiting, moderate nausea and mild vague postprandial epigastric pain. NKDA. she is a white F aged 63 ys. o:Height 61 in, Weight 127 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.

s:patient presents with mild vague postprandial epigastric pain x 2 weeks. pt also complains of moderate nausea, moderate vomiting. she is a F first mate aged 63 years. she denies drinking alcohol she denies smoking o:Height 62 in, Weight 130 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered EGD.
